channel.name: Caregility BJC - Stage System ADT
channel.description: 2022-02-15 JER - Modified to add channelMap to display Custom Metadata for MsgCtrlId, PatientId, Domain. 2022-02-21 PP - Added a transformer step from Jeffery, to handle A17-Swap and A40-Merge messages. 2022-02-22 JER - For A17 Moved patients array outside of the evaluation of PID segment and added handling of circumstances where PID-3.5 or MRG-1.5 is not provided (aka undefined) per received HL7 data different facilities 2022-02-22 JER - For A40 Moved the survivorPatient object initialization before the for each PID.3 element XMl list 2022-02-28 JER - Modified to use code_templates: json_pid_patient, json_pv1_visit and json_mrg_patient remote methods and modified the destination by disabling the Mock API destination. 2022-03-03 JER - Added Destination Connector Response transformation with the purpose of this script is to decode the Base64 encoded RESTful response payload from the EHR Bridge response 2022-03-04 JER - Required to make this change from patient object to patient array per changes correlating with the prior A17 and A40 changes to use patient array 2022-03-09 JER - Added Caregility Dev API - env4-ehrbridgeapi.caregility.net/api/v1/patients Destination Connector to Send msgs to Dev Mirth Connect (IP: 172.21.3.5) 2022-03-10 PP - Per QA call on 03/09 and Discussion with JER, added admissionDate and dischargeDate elements inside Patient Data in code template 2022-03-10 PP - Added New Destination 'Development Mirth Connect (send test Data to Dev)' to get test data in Dev Environment 2022-03-10 PP - Added code Template to handle Gender, per EHRbridge request and discussed with JER 2022-03-10 PP - Filter added at source for filtering A04, A06, A07, A17 as asked by JER 2022-04-11 JER - Added Source Adapter Filter - Filter Validation of HL7 Message for valid PID-3 and PID-18 values 2022-05-26 JER - Modified added a new Source Transformation to Anonymize HL7 Patient Demographics (disabled) and moved the HL7 to JSON transformation to the Destination HTTP RESTful Connector 2022-06-03 PP - Added Destination 'Customer Staging API'
